content.rendered:
Why Join Us

We are a dynamic team

Open Positions
2017

Founding year

€10 Million

Funding raised from Euronext, Inveniam, Apex Group and K20 Fund

Transforming capital markets

Retail banking is digital. Thanks to new technology, this industry has undergone significant changes over the past decade and consumers now have instant access to digital banking services, 24/7 and 365 days a year.

Capital markets remain analogue. This industry is full of manual and costly processes, leading to complex and disjointed systems. Through tokenization, we enable institutions to digitize financial assets, such as equities, loans, bonds, funds and other securities, to streamline their administration and provide firms with a digital-first service.

8

Employees

0

Nationalities

0

Languages

0

Projects powered

State of the art technology

We provide investment banks, funds, mid-cap companies and distributors with the modular and user-friendly technology required for firms to digitise their processes, so they can enforce global compliance obligations, enable automation and drive efficiency.

Learn More About Our Products

We are recognized as Blockchain 50 by CB Insights

“We’re immensely proud. It shows the massive opportunity we have in Europe, and how our technology provides solutions that are needed in the financial services industry. The team has done brilliantly to achieve such a respected award.“

Luc Falempin Tokeny Solutions CEO

Reasons to join us

Pioneering

Work on pioneering projects that are shaping the future of capital markets.

International

Human-sized and international team with more than 13 nationalities.

Career Growth

Grow quickly and professionally with a highly skilled and engaged team.

High Potential

Join a fast-growing company that’s a leader in its industry.

Tokeny’s Talent｜José’s Story

access_time19 August 2021
José Navalon is Full Stack Developer at Tokeny Solutions.  Who are you? My name is Jose Navalon, I currently live with my wife and my son in Geldrop, a little town in the Netherlands. I was born and raised in…
Read More
I have joined this awesome family for four years, I enjoy the working environment where your achievements are shared and acknowledged. I have learned so much from my coworkers, they are always being supportive. Everyone is serious and professional when it comes to working, but you will be surprised when you go for after-work drinks with them, they are fun! This is the place to be!
Shurong LiHead of Marketing
Last summer, I had the opportunity to intern at Tokeny. From the start, I felt a sense of belonging which I can confidently say I have not felt in other places. The team was always ready to guide me and teach me every step of the way. Thanks to this inclusion, I felt that my contributions were greatly appreciated. Very quickly, it became a real pleasure to come to the office everyday and work with the team! It is without a doubt that I say that Tokeny is more than an office, it is a family that supports each other.
Helena LambertSummer Intern
It feels really empowering to be part of such a diversified company. Tokeny’s team members gather talents and cultural wealth from many different nationalities. I accomplished my dream of working in a global environment.
Mathieu CottinHead of Business Development

FAQ

How should I apply?
How long it takes for the recruitment process?
Can I apply for more than one job at the same time?
Do you offer internships?
What can I do if there is currently no relevant vacancy?

How should I apply?

Have a look at our job page, or send us your CV, cover letter, links to social media, articles, videos and whatever you think will make a difference to recruitment@tokeny.com

How long it takes for the recruitment process?

You’ll firstly have a short interview with our Talent Acquisition Manager, followed by the relevant hiring manager (depending on the position you are applying to), then a last interview with our CEO. The timing depends, but usually won’t take longer than two to four weeks.

Can I apply for more than one job at the same time?

Yes, you can apply for multiple openings.

Do you offer internships?

Yes, we do.

What can I do if there is currently no relevant vacancy?

You can still contact us with your CV which we will keep on file and contact you should there be any suitable opportunities.

We invite you to join us in our next chapter to create a better and brighter financial future for all.

Apply Now
